page.title: 02ATTITUDES TO TOURISM
page.content:
I wish{that holiday makers}would come to Torquay in the winter because then we would have the beaches all to ourselves in the summer.I'm not saying that{holiday makers}are horrible,in fact there is nothing wrong with about 80% of them.It's just a few who scatter their rubbish all over the place.Most of them know how to use a rubbish bin correctly and they try to keep Torquay tidy. They park their cars all over the place and nobody who lives in Torquay can park their cars.Torquay is full of people when{holiday makers} come.It's awful;nobody can move anywhere and the queues in shops are dreadful.My opinion of{holiday makers is that they are a{NECESSARY NUISANCE}
Kirsty Brinsley
